title: Foothill Trainer Tray clips in your GPS mount, holds phone & remote for indoor training
content:
Foothill is back with another simple gadget to make cyclists’ home life easier – their new Trainer Tray simply clips into your existing GPS mount to give you a spot to rest your phone or TV remote while training indoors.
